text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: A mere quarter reduction in resistance coefficient...? Then reduce the distance by 5%――...Tch, as expected, totally useless.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text:
Oh-ho, Shakur, even today you line up numbers 
as always. Well well, quite impressive!

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: Huh!? Are you picking a fight...?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: No, really? I... just wondered whether within the numbers you believe in, there actually is an answer.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: What if the answer you seek isn’t in the numbers? What if spiritual or mental strength becomes the stronger factor over logic?

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: No matter how much you peel, you’ll never reach a seed forever! Even then you claim you find the seed in an onion!? Really!?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: ...Hah? An onion is itself a bulb. There isn’t some seed. Stop twisting the argument.

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: Ah-hahaha!! Yes, that was just a little jest!!

text_block_list.name: Agnes Tachyon
text_block_list.text: But by my jest, your mental seems to have shaken somewhat. If so, might there also be a similar effect in the race?

text_block_list.name: Air Shakur
text_block_list.text: I couldn’t care less. Seriously... you’re still as crazy as ever.
